title: manasulOna mukti
sahitya:
manasulOna mukti marmamundirA mahA shuddha shaktimayamaina divya


anupallavi

  anaka anakapATa viniki ramyamE antarmuga dhyAnamE jnAnagamyamE


caraNam    saptAdi viSaya janma vAsanalu dATiyAtmalOnu tETapaTiyuNTu
guptamaina guhalO nartanamu jUDu guNadvanda vikAramulEni shAnta
